channel.title: [PI] Items Vanish on Death

item.title: [PI] Items Vanish on Death
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

I am trying to add my own simple version of overload potions and I want them to be deleted upon death. I want them to vanish so the killer cannot get them. I tried making up my own code, got no error, but it didnâ€™t work. Can you fix my code or tell me how to do this?

[code] public boolean hasOverload() {
return playerHasItem(2439,1);
}

public void loseOverload() {
	if (c.isDead = true) {
	deleteItem(2439,1);
	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
